Package org.emrick.project.audio

package org.emrick.project.audio
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.emrick.project
    Main Source Package Basic Overview of Code Structure: Main File - MediaEditorGUI.java Contains all logic for app setup and contains many implemented listener methods for handling events and passing data between classes Notable Methods (in no particular order): createAndShowGUI() - sets up the window and initializes and adds all the panels updateEffectViewPanel() - called whenever a new effect panel needs to be created (selecting a different performer, selecting a different effect type, etc.) exportPackets() - exports all packet data to a single file in a format that is readable by the lights onFinishRepaint() - called after every repaint.
